title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Competencies: Machine Learning Framework for Alloy Design in Additive Manufacturing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Metallurgy and Manufacturing Processes, Along with Fundamental Computer Skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can predict key properties of alloys for additive manufacturing (solidification range, hot cracking susceptibility, etc.) using a machine learning-based design framework
Learners can perform simulations in a virtual environment to design alloy compositions optimized for AM processes through multi-objective optimization
Learners can analyze and evaluate the predicted microstructure and mechanical properties of designed alloys using VR-based simulations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
